# SKProductStorePromotionVisibility.show

**Case**

Indicates product is shown.

## Declaration

```swift
case show
```

## Enumeration cases

- **SKProductStorePromotionVisibility.default**: Indicates product visibility is the same as the default value set in App Store Connect.
- **SKProductStorePromotionVisibility.hide**: Indicates product is hidden.
